fileDescription: A Python script that sends a WhatsApp message using the pywhatkit library.

functions.name: sendwhatmsg
functions.summary: Sends a WhatsApp message to a specified phone number at a specified time.

parameters.name: phone_no
parameters.description: The phone number to send the message to, including the country code.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message content to be sent.

parameters.name: hour
parameters.description: The hour (in 24-hour format) at which to send the message.

parameters.name: minutes
parameters.description: The minutes at which to send the message.
